attributes.action: Review the decision to only award NHS workers a 1% pay rise
attributes.additional_details: Think again about the size of the pay increase, it needs to be a fairer figure, in my humble opinion 4-6% minimum is a starting point
attributes.background: To review the financial ability to award the brave focused workers a fairer pay rise, in light of what they have been through in the last year.......

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Give NHS Covid heroes a minimum 5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578004
